If-None-Match.description:
ETag value to identify the last known version of requested resource.\
To avoid useless exchange, we recommend you to indicate the ETag you previously got from this operation.\
If the ETag value does not match the response will be 200 to give you a new content, otherwise the response will be: 304 Not Modified, without any content.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

$block: Describe the basic information related to an order. All properties with the prefix order_ are translated in the list of values /user/lov/OrderMetaInfoOrderDetails

$ul: **accountId**: The marketplace account identifier in BeezUP. This account identifier is based on your api settings.
**beezUPOrderId**: The BeezUP Order identifier
**beezUPOrderUrl**: The URL https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/URL
**etag**: ETag value to identify the order.\
**links**
**self**
**clearMerchantInfo**
**harvest**
**history**
**setMerchantInfo**
**marketplaceBusinessCode**: In an marketplace technical code like CDiscount you can have several marketplaces like GO SPORT, etc. We identify them by a business code.
**marketplaceTechnicalCode**: The technical code of the marketplace.
**order_Buyer_Name**: Buyer full name
**order_CurrencyCode**: The currency code (ISO 4217)
**order_Invoice_Number**: The order invoice number
**order_Invoice_Uri**: The order invoice URI
**order_LastModificationUtcDate**: The last modification UTC date done by BeezUP of this order
**order_MarketplaceLastModificationUtcDate**: The last modification UTC date done by the marketplace on this order
**order_MarketplaceOrderId**: The order marketplace identifier
**order_MerchantECommerceSoftwareName**: The e-commerce software name of the merchant
**order_MerchantECommerceSoftwareVersion**: The e-commece software version of the merchant
**order_MerchantOrderId**: The order merchant identifier
**order_PurchaseUtcDate**: The purchase date of this order
**order_Status_BeezUPOrderStatus**: BeezUP order status. Unified for all marketplaces.
**order_Status_MarketplaceOrderStatus**: The marketplace order state
**order_TotalPrice**: The total price of this order (corresponding to the amount paid by the customer)
**processing**: If true, there is currently a harvest or an order change in progress. Otherwise false.
**orderItems**
**order_Buyer_AddressCity**: The Buyer address city of this order
**order_Buyer_AddressCountryIsoCodeAlpha2**: The Buyer address country iso code alpha 2 (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#/decoding_table for more details)
**order_Buyer_AddressCountryName**: The Buyer address country name
**order_Buyer_AddressLine1**: The Buyer address line 1 of this order
**order_Buyer_AddressLine2**: The Buyer address line 2 of this order
**order_Buyer_AddressLine3**: The Buyer address line 3 of this order
**order_Buyer_AddressPostalCode**: The Buyer address postal code of this order
**order_Buyer_AddressStateOrRegion**: The Buyer address state or region of this order
**order_Buyer_Civility**: The buyer civility for this order
**order_Buyer_CompanyName**: The buyer company name for this order
**order_Buyer_Email**: The email of the buyer for this order
**order_Buyer_FirstName**: Order Buyer first name
**order_Buyer_Identifier**: The buyer identifier for this order
**order_Buyer_LastName**: Order Buyer last name
**order_Buyer_MobilePhone**: The mobile phone number of the buyer for this order
**order_Buyer_Phone**: The phone number of the buyer for this order
**order_Comment**: The comment associated to this order
**order_FulfilledBy**: The order FulfilledBy
**order_IsBusiness**: The order IsBusiness
**order_IsPrime**: Indicates if the order is considered as Prime (only on Amazon)
**order_MarketPlaceChannel**: Useful to identify the origin of the order. For example in Amazon.
**order_OrderItemsSourceUri**: Technical information: The url to the source of this order items. We received this information from the marketplace.
**order_OrderSourceUri**: Technical information: The url to the source of this order. We received this information from the marketplace.
**order_PayingUtcDate**: The UTC date of the payment of this order
**order_PaymentMethod**: The payment method of this order
**order_Shipping_AddressCity**: The shipping address city of this order
**order_Shipping_AddressCountryIsoCodeAlpha2**: The shipping address country iso code alpha 2 (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#/decoding_table for more details)
**order_Shipping_AddressCountryName**: The shipping address country name
**order_Shipping_AddressLine1**: The shipping address line 1 of this order
**order_Shipping_AddressLine2**: The shipping address line 2 of this order
**order_Shipping_AddressLine3**: The shipping address line 3 of this order
**order_Shipping_AddressName**: The name of the person in the shipping address for this order
**order_Shipping_AddressPostalCode**: The shipping address postal code of this order
**order_Shipping_AddressStateOrRegion**: The shipping address state or region of this order
**order_Shipping_Civility**: The civility of the person in the shipping address for this order
**order_Shipping_CompanyName**: The company name of the shipping address for this order
**order_Shipping_EarliestShipUtcDate**: The UTC date of the earliest ship for this order
**order_Shipping_Email**: The email of the person in the shipping address for this order
**order_Shipping_FirstName**: Order Shipping first name
**order_Shipping_LastName**: Order Shipping last name
**order_Shipping_LatestShipUtcDate**: The UTC date of the latest ship for this order
**order_Shipping_Method**: The shipping method of this order
**order_Shipping_MobilePhone**: The mobile phone number of the person in the shipping address for this order
**order_Shipping_Phone**: The phone number of the person in the shipping address for this order
**order_Shipping_Price**: The shipping price of this order
**order_Shipping_ShippingTax**: The shipping tax for this order
**order_TotalCommission**: The total commission of this order
**order_TotalTax**: The total tax of this order
**transitionLinks**: Contains the authorized change actions for an order
**errors**
**errors**
